splits.name: vic2_timing_chip_variants_badlines
splits.description: VIC-II chip variants (6567/6569/8562/8565), PAL vs NTSC frame timing, cycles per line, raster lines, and bad line conditions with cycle stealing details

splits.name: vic2_timing_sprites_memory_access_display
splits.description: Sprite DMA timing and cycle stealing, VIC-II memory access pattern (phi1/phi2), display window coordinates (RSEL/CSEL), vertical blanking by chip variant

splits.name: vic2_timing_cycle_budgets_practical
splits.description: Practical CPU cycle budgets per frame (PAL vs NTSC), music/sound timing, raster effect considerations, sprite multiplexing timing, PAL/NTSC detection in software
